## Graficando un mapa

```{r fig, fig.height = 8, fig.width = 8, fig.align = "center"}

library(sf)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggrepel)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)

mapa <- mapas$departamentos
mapa_c <- st_centroid(mapa) 
mapa_c <- mapa_c %>% 
  mutate(
    lng = unlist(map(mapa_c$geometry,1)),
    lat = unlist(map(mapa_c$geometry,2))
    )

n_lng <- c(
-80, # AMAZONAS
-82, # ANCASH
-67, # APURIMAC
-72, # AREQUIPA
-74, # AYACUCHO
-84, # CAJAMARCA
-80, # CALLAO
-68, # CUSCO
-79, # HUANCAVELICA
-72, # HUANUCO
-76, # ICA
-78, # JUNIN
-83, # LA LIBERTAD
-84, # LAMBAYEQUE
-81, # LIMA
-71, # LORETO
-67, # MADRE DE DIOS
-67, # MOQUEGUA
-81, # PASCO
-84, # PIURA
-66.5, # PUNO
-70, # SAN MARTIN
-68, # TACNA
-82, # TUMBES
-69 # UCAYALI
)

n_lat <- c(
-2, # AMAZONAS
-9, # ANCASH
-13, # APURIMAC
-19, # AREQUIPA
-18, # AYACUCHO
-5.5, # CAJAMARCA
-11.9, # CALLAO
-11.5, # CUSCO
-15, # HUANCAVELICA
-8, # HUANUCO
-17, # ICA
-13, # JUNIN
-7.8, # LA LIBERTAD
-6.5, # LAMBAYEQUE
-11, # LIMA
-1, # LORETO
-10, # MADRE DE DIOS
-17, # MOQUEGUA
-10, # PASCO
-4, # PIURA
-15, # PUNO
-5, # SAN MARTIN
-18, # TACNA
-2.5, # TUMBES
-8 # UCAYALI
)

mapa_c <- mapa_c %>% 
  mutate(
    nudge_lng = n_lng - mapa_c$lng,
    nudge_lat = n_lat - mapa_c$lat
      )

graph <- ggplot(data=mapa, aes())+
  geom_sf(color="black", fill="greenyellow")+
  ggtitle('MAPA DEL PERÃš')+
  #theme_void()+
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)
    )+
  geom_sf(data = mapas$lago_titicaca, color='black', fill='lightblue')+
  geom_sf(data = mapa_c, color = 'black')+
  geom_text_repel(
    data= mapa_c, aes(x = lng, y = lat, label=DEPARTAMENTO),
    fontface = "bold", 
    size = 3,
    #box.padding = 0.5,
    #force = 250,
    #force_pull = 1,
    nudge_x = mapa_c$nudge_lng,
    nudge_y = mapa_c$nudge_lat,
    direction = "both",
    segment.curvature = -1e-20,
    segment.ncp = 5,
    segment.angle = 30
    )+
  expand_limits(x = c(-85,-66), y = c(0,-19))
graph
```
